locations.name: New york
locations.description:
Most people who arrive early wait on the front steps or in the sanctuary, you can also wait outside of the side door around the corner on 71st street

Hot food is served downstairs in the basement

They always have regular or vegetarian options which you can eat in the dining room or immediately get in line to wait for seconds to be served

It's a very nice church overall and the crowd is resonably friendly as far as soup kichens usually go
